channel.title: !Help With A Code!

item.title: !Help With A Code!
item.dc:creator: @brendan_swan brendan swan
item.description:
@brendan_swan wrote:

Ok So my m8 made me a ::giveitemcode it works fine on people with names w/o a space such as abcdefg but if it has a space such as abc defg then it doesnt work so what should i DO?

Code:

Gives some items. ::giveitem username itemId amount
*/
if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“giveitem”)) {
try {
String playerName = cmd[1];
int itemId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
int amount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]);
int index = Engine.getIdFromName(playerName);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(Engine.players[index], itemId, amount);
p.message("You gave " + playerName + " item " + itemId + “.”);
} catch (Exception e) {
p.message(“Command failed. Please try again. Remember the player has to be online.”);
}
return;
}

i do have team viewer and msn
Msn: Brendanrobertswan@hotmail.com PLEASE HELP!!!

Read full topic
